subject: Soccer
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: U.S. Coach Bob Bradley may have mollified his critics with a semifinal berth at the Confederations Cup, but the the American team will face a stiff test Wednesday against Spain.
snippet: U.S. Coach Bob Bradley may have mollified his critics with a semifinal berth at the Confederations Cup, but the the American team will face a stiff test Wednesday against Spain.
